ygData.subject: Re: Question about quest item again
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/19/99 11:06:13 AM Eastern Daylight Time, scott@speechworks.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/19/99 11:06:13 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
scott@... writes:

<<
I previously wrote that I had some sort of gnoll
fur quest item. I think I tricked myself (i'm not playing eq now and
couldn't check).

I think I had a gnoll fang that I couldn't sell.
(Hopefully I'm remembering correctly)

Anyone know what to do with a gnoll fang?
>>

Gnoll Fangs are a quest item. The quest is given by the female Warrior
trainer next to the Pit of Doom in Halas the Barbarian enclave. You have to
get 3 or more and you get a little exp and some copper.
